law.catch_line: Where action against persons constructively summoned must be brought.
law.text: Excepting the actions mentioned in KRS 452.400 to 452.425, both inclusive, and in KRS 452.440 and KRS 452.470, an action against a defendant who may be proceeded against by a warning order, must be brought in a county in which the defendant resides at the commencement of the action; or in which he has property; or, in which a person resides against whom he has a valid claim for money or property.
law.history: Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 75.
